statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -2 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ 4 \\ 12 \\ -4 \\ 8 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -10 \\ -2 \\ 6 \\ -10 \\ 8 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
